summary: pneumonia is an infection of the lung due to bacterial, viral or fungal pathogens. the threat of emerging pathogens presenting as pneumonia has highlighted the importance of the surveillance of pneumonia and other severe respiratory infections. retrospective study used aggregated national surveillance data and meteorological data during the period 3 January 2011 to 1 January 2017. we compared the performance of autoregressive integrated moving average model (ARIMA) with multiple linear regression models with ARIMA errors.
